objects.text:
• Durable Faux Leather
• Spacious Stylish Design
• Gold Hardware Accents
• Perfect Medium Size

product_details.description: ALDO womens Durable handbag This spaciously stylish tote bag boasts ample storage space and shoulder strap for extra utility Made of synthetic materials 1 compartment: stylish and functional to store your cell phone, wallet, or any other essential you need near by Medium: the perfect medium sized handbag for everyday life Size: 10.9'' L x 4'' W x 12.4'' H (28cm x 10.5cm x 32cm) Fabric type - Faux Leather ** Origin - Imported ** Closure type - Zipper ** Lining - Synthetic ** Country of Origin - Cambodia **

banner_details:
This banner design showcases an elegant and minimalist layout for promoting a fashion accessory. The background features soft neutral tones with abstract elements, including faded circles and diagonal line art, adding sophistication without being distracting. The header text layer (id: "heading") is bold and attention-grabbing, while the subheading (id: "subheading") uses a serif font that conveys luxury. Supporting features are listed clearly in the description text (id: "description"). The price tag (id: "price") is prominently displayed in large font, complemented by a strong call-to-action button (id: "cta") on a rounded rectangle background (id: "cta_background"). The product image (id: "product_image") is centrally placed and brightly lit for visual emphasis.

**Color Palette:**
- Soft Cream (#F6EFE4)
- Warm Beige (#E8D3BC)
- Rich Brown (#83572E)
- Golden Tan (#C69C6D)
- Dark Walnut (#5E3F20)
- White (#FFFFFF)
product_color: The product image showcases a sophisticated handbag in a warm, muted camel brown (#B0816C) that dominates the composition with a textured matte finish, conveying elegance. The color palette for an advertisement banner can leverage this primary brown tone, accented with sleek metallic gold (#D4AF37) seen in the hardware and charm elements. These gold accents add a luxurious contrast and are carefully placed to highlight functional and fashionable aspects without overpowering the overall aesthetic. The subtle blending of the matte brown with polished gold enhances visual interest. White (#FFFFFF) or soft beige (#F5F5DC) can be used as background colors in the banner for contrast.
